headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: name
body.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

body.name: ip-address
body.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address.

body.name: name
body.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

body.name: ip-address
body.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address. If both addresses are required use ipv4-address and ipv6-address fields explicitly.

body.name: network-mask
body.description: IPv4 or IPv6 network mask. If both masks are required use ipv4-network-mask and ipv6-network-mask fields explicitly. Instead of providing mask itself it is possible to specify IPv4 or IPv6 mask length in mask-length field. If both masks length are required use ipv4-mask-length and ipv6-mask-length fields explicitly.

body.name: anti-spoofing
body.description: Is anti spoofing enabled on the interface.

body.name: action
body.description: If packets will be rejected (the Prevent option) or whether the packets will be monitored (the Detect option).

body.name: exclude-packets
body.description: Don't check packets from excluded network.

body.name: excluded-network-name
body.description: Excluded network name.

body.name: excluded-network-uid
body.description: Excluded network UID.

body.name: spoof-tracking
body.description: Spoof tracking.

body.name: topology
body.description: Topology configuration.

body.name: topology-settings
valid_values: network defined by the interface ip and net mask

body.name: interface-leads-to-dmz
body.description: Whether this interface leads to demilitarized zone (perimeter network).

body.name: ip-address-behind-this-interface
body.description: Network settings behind this interface.
valid_values: network defined by the interface ip and net mask

body.name: specific-network
body.description: Network behind this interface.

body.name: color
body.description: Color of the object. Should be one of existing colors.

body.name: comments
body.description: Comments string.

body.name: details-level
body.description: The level of detail for some of the fields in the response can vary from showing only the UID value of the object to a fully detailed representation of the object.

body.name: domains-to-process
body.description: Indicates which domains to process the commands on. It cannot be used with the details-level full, must be run from the System Domain only and with ignore-warnings true. Valid values are: CURRENT_DOMAIN, ALL_DOMAINS_ON_THIS_SERVER.

body.name: tags
body.description: Collection of tag identifiers.

body.name: ignore-warnings
body.description: Apply changes ignoring warnings.

body.name: ignore-errors
body.description: Apply changes ignoring errors. You won't be able to publish such a changes. If ignore-warnings flag was omitted - warnings will also be ignored.

body.name: name
body.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

body.name: ip-address
body.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address. If both addresses are required use ipv4-address and ipv6-address fields explicitly.

body.name: network-mask
body.description: IPv4 or IPv6 network mask. If both masks are required use ipv4-network-mask and ipv6-network-mask fields explicitly. Instead of providing mask itself it is possible to specify IPv4 or IPv6 mask length in mask-length field. If both masks length are required use ipv4-mask-length and ipv6-mask-length fields explicitly.

body.name: anti-spoofing
body.description: Is anti spoofing enabled on the interface.

body.name: action
body.description: If packets will be rejected (the Prevent option) or whether the packets will be monitored (the Detect option).

body.name: exclude-packets
body.description: Don't check packets from excluded network.

body.name: excluded-network-name
body.description: Excluded network name.

body.name: excluded-network-uid
body.description: Excluded network UID.

body.name: spoof-tracking
body.description: Spoof tracking.

body.name: topology
body.description: Topology configuration.

body.name: topology-settings
valid_values: network defined by the interface ip and net mask

body.name: interface-leads-to-dmz
body.description: Whether this interface leads to demilitarized zone (perimeter network).

body.name: ip-address-behind-this-interface
body.description: Network settings behind this interface.
valid_values: network defined by the interface ip and net mask

body.name: specific-network
body.description: Network behind this interface.

body.name: color
body.description: Color of the object. Should be one of existing colors.

body.name: comments
body.description: Comments string.

body.name: details-level
body.description: The level of detail for some of the fields in the response can vary from showing only the UID value of the object to a fully detailed representation of the object.

body.name: domains-to-process
body.description: Indicates which domains to process the commands on. It cannot be used with the details-level full, must be run from the System Domain only and with ignore-warnings true. Valid values are: CURRENT_DOMAIN, ALL_DOMAINS_ON_THIS_SERVER.

body.name: tags
body.description: Collection of tag identifiers.

body.name: ignore-warnings
body.description: Apply changes ignoring warnings.

body.name: ignore-errors
body.description: Apply changes ignoring errors. You won't be able to publish such a changes. If ignore-warnings flag was omitted - warnings will also be ignored.

body.name: vpn-domain
body.description: Network group representing the customized encryption domain. Must be set when vpn-domain-type is set to 'manual' option.

body.name: vpn-domain-exclude-external-ip-addresses
body.description: Exclude the external IP addresses from the VPN domain of this Interoperable Device.

body.name: vpn-domain-type
body.description: Indicates the encryption domain.

success.name: lock
success.description: Object lock state. It's not allowed to edit objects locked by other session.

success.name: locking-admin
success.description: in case the object is locked by another session it will show the administrator name that locked the object.

success.name: locking-session-id
success.description: in case the object is locked by another session it will show the session uid that locked the object.

success.name: validation-state
success.description: N/A

add-interoperable-device with default in.description: Adds an Interoperable Device with default interface

add-interoperable-device with external i.description: Adds an Interoperable Device with external interface
Adds Interoperable Device with external interface and anti-spoofing settings changed

add-interoperable-device with internal i.description: Adds Interoperable Device with internal interface and dmz enabled
add-interoperable-device with internal i.request:
POST {{server}}/add-interoperable-device
Content-Type: application/json
X-chkp-sid: {{session}}

{
  "name" : "NewInteroperableDevice",
  "ip-address" : "192.168.10.6",
  "interfaces.ip-address" : "100.150.200.0",
  "interfaces.network-mask" : "255.255.255.0",
  "interfaces.name" : "internalInterface",
  "interfaces.topology-settings.interface-leads-to-dmz" : "true",
  "interfaces.topology-settings.ip-address-behind-this-interface" : "network defined by the interface ip and net mask"
}

add-interoperable-device with IPv4 addre.description: Adds Interoperable Device with IPv4 address

add-interoperable-device with IPv4 and I.description: Adds Interoperable Device with IPv4 and IPv6 addresses

add-interoperable-device with IPv6 addre.description: Adds Interoperable Device with IPv6 address

add-interoperable-device with vpn-domain.description: Adds Interoperable Device with vpn-domain option
